name: Deep Sleep (HaydenWyatt)
description:
IMPORTANT: The social media links on the start menu do not work, due to browser security limitations preventing the code from opening links. Instead, the links can be found below:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQEpu4v1g527n5DQ6L4AxiA

Made for Ludum Dare 48 (Theme: "Deeper and Deeper")

The game takes place in the main character's dream as they drift into a deeper and deeper sleep.
